Summary: tastes good, nice to eat a spoonful before bed or put in a tea
text: This honey tastes good, nice to eat a spoonful before bed or put in a tea. A little thick to go with whiskey for a bedtime tonic, though. It has a strong flavor, and is thick and sticky. I don't usually eat it on toast, and for the cost won't put it in recipes, but it is soothing to have a bite of honey before going to sleep.
